title: Superb !!!!!!
text: What a Fantastic find - PERFECT LOCATION only 2 blocks from Times Square, GREAT ROOMS -spacious and clean and EXCELLENT STAFF very helpful and friendly. There is a vey relaxed atmosphere at breakfast crossiants, bagles, muffins and cereals and complimentary tea and coffee !!! The rooms are stylish (not a bit of floral chintz to be seen) and comfy beds. The staff were most helpful and we will definatley be returning !!
